mapper.select: SELECT pii.*, poi.*, pai.bid_name, pfii.file_md5 FROM pb_item_info pii LEFT JOIN pb_object_info poi ON pii.item_id = poi.item_id LEFT JOIN pb_file_img_info pfii ON pfii.object_id = poi.object_id LEFT JOIN pb_apply_info pai ON pai.item_id = poi.item_id

SELECT pai.bid_name as bidName, pqi.* FROM pb_quote_info pqi LEFT JOIN pb_object_info poi ON poi.object_id = pqi.object_id LEFT JOIN pb_apply_info pai ON pai.apply_id = pqi.apply_id LEFT JOIN pb_item_info pii ON pii.item_id = poi.item_id
pii.item_id = #{itemId}

SELECT pii.item_id,pii.item_code,pii.item_name,pii.bid_rule,pii.bid_way,pii.start_state,poi.object_name, poi.bid_start_time,poi.bid_end_time,pii.resource_type FROM pb_item_info pii LEFT JOIN pb_object_info poi ON pii.item_id=poi.item_id
pii.item_name like '%${name}%'
and pii.item_code like '%${code}%'

insert into pb_bidding_rules (rule_model,free_bid_time,bid_delay_time,bid_interval_time) value (#{ruleModel},#{freeBidTime},#{bidDelayTime},#{bidIntervalTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pb_bidding_rules WHERE rule_id= (SELECT bid_rule FROM pb_item_info WHERE item_id=#{itemId})

select pb_object_info.object_code, pb_object_info.object_id, pb_object_info.bid_start_time, pb_object_info.object_name, pb_item_info.* from pb_object_info, pb_item_info where pb_object_info.item_id=pb_item_info.item_id and pb_item_info.flow_id = #{moneyStatus}

SELECT poi.bid_status,poi.trad,poi.priority_enter_name,poi.start_price,poi.reserve_price,poi.unit, poi.bid_start_time,poi.bid_end_time,poi.quote_increment,poi.evaluate_price,poi.bid_delay_time, pain.money,psi.bid_delay_len,psi.bid_free_len,pqi.quote_price,s.newPrice,pqi.mark FROM pb_object_info poi LEFT JOIN pb_apply_info pain ON poi.object_id=pain.object_id LEFT JOIN pb_supply_info psi ON poi.object_id=psi.object_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pb_quote_info.object_id,max(quote_price) quote_price,pb_apply_info.mark FROM pb_quote_info LEFT JOIN pb_apply_info ON pb_apply_info.apply_id=pb_quote_info.apply_id) pqi ON poi.object_id=pqi.object_id LEFT JOIN ( select quote_price newPrice,object_id from pb_quote_info s ORDER BY ABS(NOW() - s.quote_time) ASC limit 1 ) s ON s.object_id=poi.object_id WHERE poi.object_id = #{objectId}

select pb_object_info.object_code, pb_object_info.object_id, pb_object_info.bid_start_time, pb_object_info.object_name, pb_item_info.* from pb_object_info, pb_item_info where pb_object_info.item_id=pb_item_info.item_id and pb_item_info.flow_id = #{moneyStatus} and pb_item_info.item_id = #{key}
